divs: Sighting Detailsi was playing golf. near lancaster ontario. my brothers were finding there balls on the other fairway. suddenly i looked up. the sky was blue with a few clouds. this ufo was motionless. i never saw metal of its kind there seemed to be straps above the ufo made of metal. half the ufo was hidden by a cloud.approx 3 minutes later it disapeared. no smoke .just gone. i did not share this story with my family. they are devout christians and would have told me it was a plane. i am glad to share this story. i have incurable cancer and i always wanted to share my experience with someone without being told i am crazy. i will never forget what i saw that day. what a feeling.
Summary: noticed it beside cloud. was not a plane . did not move. then vanished
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Cornwall
There were no other sightings in Cornwall on or around August 11th 2001
